title: Introduction to bettoR
text: three primary odds types come across America: American (-150, +130) Fractional (2/3, 13/10) Decimal (1.667, 2.3) convert_odds function can easily switch odds around whatever format comfortable . example: LA Lakers playing LA Clippers bookie Lakers’ moneyline bet 1.667… ’m familiar decimal odds (even though actually simplest form work digress…). like convert American odds. convert_odds function takes 3 arguments - odds, input odds type, type odds like output . aren’t exactly sure output, simply set output = "" leave output argument blank function return odds types plus implied probability bet.
code: convert_odds(odds = -150, input = "us", output = "all") #>    Decimal American Fraction Implied_Probability #> 1 1.666667     -150      2/3                 0.6

title: Authors and Citation
text: Jason Lee. Author, maintainer. Jared Lee. Author, contributor.

text: Lee J, Lee J (2023). bettoR: Sports Betting Tools. https://github.com/papagorgio23/bettoR, https://github.com/--sports/bettoR, https://papagorgio23.github.io/bettoR/.
code: @Manual{,   title = {bettoR: Sports Betting Tools},   author = {Jason Lee and Jared Lee},   year = {2023},   note = {https://github.com/papagorgio23/bettoR, https://github.com/a-i-sports/bettoR, https://papagorgio23.github.io/bettoR/}, }

title: Sports Betting Tools
text: package contains tools functions help sports bettors make money!

title: Sports Betting Tools
text: can install bettoR GitHub :

title: Sports Betting Tools
text: Implied probabilities, break-even win percentage, can easily found function. example given odds -350 (US Odds), 180 (US Odds), 2.5 (Decimal Odds), 4.9 (Decimal Odds), 6-1 (Fractional Odds), 2/7 (Fractional Odds).
code: implied_prob(-350, type = "us") ## [1] 0.7777778 implied_prob(180, type = "us") ## [1] 0.3571429 implied_prob(2.5, type = "dec") ## [1] 0.4 implied_prob(4.9, type = "dec") ## [1] 0.2040816 implied_prob(6/1, type = "frac") ## [1] 0.1428571 implied_prob(2/7, type = "frac") ## [1] 0.7777778

title: Sports Betting Tools
text: Let’s say believe bet 75% chance cover, price ? Using implied odds function can give price based probability.
code: implied_odds(0.75, type = "us") ## [1] -300 implied_odds(0.75, type = "frac") ## [1] 1/3 implied_odds(0.75, type = "dec") ## [1] 1.333333 implied_odds(0.75, type = "all") ##    Decimal American Fraction Implied.Probability ## 1 1.333333     -300      1/3                0.75

title: Sports Betting Tools
text: Let’s say want convert American Odds see screen (-175) another type.

title: Sports Betting Tools
text: Betting market difficult enough sportsbooks skew odds even favor. (-110, -110) industry standard. hold, vig/juice, bet can found like : sportsbooks newly legalized states taking advantage bettors lines (-125, -125) increase juice : 120% increase price.

title: Bankroll Simulation — bankroll_plot
text: function simulates visualizes bettors bankroll number bets using edge.

title: Bankroll Simulation — bankroll_plot
code: bankroll_plot(   bets = 256,   win_rate = 0.55,   bet_size = 100,   sim_length = 1000,   avg_odds = -110,   odds_type = "us",   current_bet = NULL,   current_win = NULL )

title: Bankroll Simulation — bankroll_plot
text: bets number bets (256) win_rate average expected win rate bets (0-1) bet_size dollar amount bet. (100) sim_length number simulations. (1,000) avg_odds average odds bets (-110) odds_type Type odds output. Possible values : us, American Odds dec, Decimal Odds frac, Fractional Odds current_bet Optional input - current total number tracked bets. (125) current_win Optional input - current total amount won/loss tracked bets. (950)

title: Bankroll Simulation — bankroll_plot
text: Plot showing bankroll results simulated bets. function also outputs percentage positive negative final bankroll course simulation.

title: Bankroll Simulation — bankroll_plot
code: bankroll_plot(   bets = 256,   win_rate = 0.55,   bet_size = 100,   sim_length = 1000,   avg_odds = -110,   odds_type = "us" ) #>  #> Positive Negative  #>    0.777    0.223  #>  #>  Median Profit/Loss = $1,450 #> Warning: The `guide` argument in `scale_*()` cannot be `FALSE`. This was deprecated in #> ggplot2 3.3.4. #> ℹ Please use "none" instead. #> ℹ The deprecated feature was likely used in the bettoR package. #>   Please report the issue at <https://github.com/papagorgio23/bettoR/issues>.  bankroll_plot(   sim_length = 500,   avg_odds = -110,   win_rate = 0.5455 ) #>  #> Positive Negative  #>    0.752    0.248  #>  #>  Median Profit/Loss = $1,030  bankroll_plot(   sim_length = 250,   avg_odds = -115,   win_rate = 0.5255,   current_bet = 100,   current_win = -500 ) #>  #> Positive Negative  #>    0.436    0.564  #>  #>  Median Profit/Loss = -$415  bankroll_plot(   sim_length = 300,   avg_odds = -109,   win_rate = 0.57,   current_bet = 175,   current_win = 5000 ) #>  #> Positive Negative  #>     0.94     0.06  #>  #>  Median Profit/Loss = $2,610  bankroll_plot() #>  #> Positive Negative  #>    0.788    0.212  #>  #>  Median Profit/Loss = $1,450

title: Calculate Bet Payout — bet_calc
text: function calculates payout given bet.

title: Calculate Bet Payout — bet_calc
text: risk Amount risked bet(s) (110, 105) odds Odds bet (-132, -115) type Type odds. Possible values : us, American Odds dec, Decimal Odds frac, Fractional Oddss

title: Calculate Bet Payout — bet_calc
text: payout Payout bet

title: Calculate Bet Payout — bet_calc
code: bet_calc(risk = 100, odds = -132, type = "us") #> [1] 175.76 bet_calc(risk = 500, odds = 2.3, type = "dec") #> [1] 1150 bet_calc(risk = 25, odds = 20/1, type = "frac") #> [1] 525

title: Bet Probability — bet_prob
text: function returns win, loss, push probabilities given bet based current line predicted line.

title: Bet Probability — bet_prob
text: pred_spread Predicted spread team want bet spread Spread team want bet (-3.5, -7, 4, 2.5) sport Sport/League teams bet . Possible values : NBA, National Basketball Association NCAAB, College Basketball NFL, National Football League NCAAF, College Football

title: Bet Probability — bet_prob
text: probs Plot simulation well percentage simulations positive negative.

title: Bet Probability — bet_prob
text: Stern, Hal. "Probability Winning Football Game function Pointspread." American Statistician 45, . 3 (1991): 179-83. Accessed July 18, 2020. doi:10.2307/2684286. https://statistics.stanford.edu/sites/g/files/sbiybj6031/f/COV%20NSF%2059.pdf Stern, Hal. "Probability Winning Football Game." American Statistician 45, . 3 (1991): 179-83. Accessed July 18, 2020. doi:10.2307/2684286. https://www-jstor-org.turing.library.northwestern.edu/stable/2684286 Winston, Wayne L. "Point Ratings Probabilities." Mathletics: Gamblers, Managers, Sports Enthusiasts Use Mathematics Baseball, Basketball, Football, 290-97. PRINCETON; OXFORD: Princeton University Press, 2009. Accessed July 18, 2020. doi:10.2307/j.ctt7sj9q.48.

title: Bet Probability — bet_prob
code: bet_prob(-9, -3.5, sport = "NFL") #>   Win.Probability Lose.Probability Push.Probability #> 1       0.6542519        0.3457481                0 bet_prob(-7, -3, sport = "NBA") #>   Win.Probability Lose.Probability Push.Probability #> 1       0.6147293        0.3538302       0.03144052 bet_prob(21, 10.5, sport = "NCAAF") #>   Win.Probability Lose.Probability Push.Probability #> 1       0.2558316        0.7441684                0 bet_prob(-3, 5, sport = "NCAAB") #>   Win.Probability Lose.Probability Push.Probability #> 1       0.7733726        0.1976625       0.02896481

title: Break Even Probability — break_even
text: function returns break even win percentage needed based amount risked amount returned bet. also factors parlay bets number legs needed convert payout. Gives percent chance need break even bet

title: Break Even Probability — break_even
text: risk Amount risked bet rtrn Amount returned bet. (Risk + amount won bet) legs number legs needed win bet. (straight bets = 1, parlay >= 2)

title: Break Even Probability — break_even
text: prob

Closing Line Value — clv_calc
text: function calculates Closing Line Value (CLV) bets.

title: Closing Line Value — clv_calc
text: bet_odds Odds bet(s) (-110, -105) closing_odds Closing Odds bet (-132, -115) type Type odds. Possible values : us, American Odds dec, Decimal Odds frac, Fractional Odds

title: Closing Line Value — clv_calc
text: clv Closing Line Value bet

title: Closing Line Value — clv_calc
code: clv_calc(   bet_odds = -110,   closing_odds = -132,   type = "us" ) #> [1] 0.0862069 clv_calc(   bet_odds = 2.5,   closing_odds = 2.3,   type = "dec" ) #> [1] 0.08695652 clv_calc(   bet_odds = 50/1,   closing_odds = 20/1,   type = "frac" ) #> [1] 1.428571

Kelly Criterion Calculation — kelly
text: function calculates Kelly Criterion percentage bankroll bet order maximize returns.

title: Kelly Criterion Calculation — kelly
text: win_prob Probability winning bet (0.55) odds Odds bet (-110) type Type odds. Possible values : us, American Odds dec, Decimal Odds frac, Fractional Odds kelly_type Optional input altering kelly formula. Possible values : half, Half Kelly quarter, Quarter Kelly eighth, Eighth Kelly

title: Kelly Criterion Calculation — kelly
text: Percentage bankroll risk bet

title: Kelly Criterion Calculation — kelly
text: Kelly Criterion wikipedia page

title: Kelly Criterion Calculation — kelly
code: kelly(   win_prob = 0.58,   odds = -132,   type = "us" ) #> [1] 0.0256 kelly(   win_prob = 0.53,   odds = -105,   type = "us",   kelly_type = "half" ) #> [1] 0.0182 kelly(   win_prob = 0.545,   odds = 2.1,   type = "dec" ) #> [1] 0.1314 kelly(   win_prob = 0.27,   odds = 5.5,   type = "dec",   kelly_type = "quarter" ) #> [1] 0.027 kelly(   win_prob = 0.10,   odds = 40/1,   type = "frac" ) #> [1] 0.0775

title: Kelly Criterion Bet Size — kelly_bet
text: function calculates Kelly Criterion returns dollar amount bet order maximize returns.

title: Kelly Criterion Bet Size — kelly_bet
text: unit_size Unit size bankroll, typically 1% bankroll (100) win_prob Probability winning bet (0.55) odds Odds bet (-110) type Type odds. Possible values : us, American Odds dec, Decimal Odds frac, Fractional Odds kelly_type Optional input altering Kelly formula. Possible values : half, Half Kelly quarter, Quarter Kelly eighth, Eighth Kelly

title: Kelly Criterion Bet Size — kelly_bet
text: Percentage bankroll risk bet

title: Kelly Criterion Bet Size — kelly_bet
text: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kelly_criterion

title: Kelly Criterion Bet Size — kelly_bet
code: kelly_bet(   unit_size = 100,   win_prob = 0.58,   odds = -132,   type = "us" ) #> [1] 256 kelly_bet(   unit_size = 50,   win_prob = 0.53,   odds = -105,   type = "us",   kelly_type = "Half" ) #> [1] 182 kelly_bet(   unit_size = 500,   win_prob = 0.545,   odds = 2.1,   type = "dec" ) #> [1] 6570 kelly_bet(   unit_size = 300,   win_prob = 0.27,   odds = 5.5,   type = "dec",   kelly_type = "Quarter" ) #> [1] 3234 kelly_bet(   unit_size = 250,   win_prob = 0.10,   odds = 40/1,   type = "frac" ) #> [1] 1938
